poemContent: Ruffling in the bushes is a creature A creature baffling, bad and anger Anger leaving the face of The earth Earth a desolate planet of death Death and more death spreading like Like butter on bread, wholemeal bread Bread not white, but brown and full Full of fibre and colour not Not false, false, false information Information dense and decrepid, yet young Young, as young as an old man Man, I wish I could taste it It tastes like acid, feels like sunlight Sunlight shining into the brain of a stain Stains projected off the weed of a killer Killer auxins spread out on the shady side Side with me if you want to live in this world Worlds collide in the swirling infinite Infinite, calisthetic, MEAT, alpha lives on On as I turn on my Mac and leave Leaving it open on my desk, forever alone Alone like Axeli. 
